name: 甜花
text:
掃除、思ったより……
長くなっちゃって……

name: 甘奈
text:
でも、
ちょっと急がなきゃかも……！
trans: But, I think we'll have to hurry...!

name: 甘奈
text:
さっき、仕事終わって向かってるって
千雪さんから連絡来てたから！
trans:
Chiyuki-san messaged me a moment ago saying she
just finished work and was headed over!

name: 甘奈
text:
こうやって──
おっきく動くと暖かくなるよ！
trans: If you make big movements like this, it'll warm you up!

name: 甘奈
text: ──わ、千雪さんもう着いたって！
trans: ──Oh no, Chiyuki-san said she's already there!

name: 甘奈
text:
打ち合わせ、
ちょっと遅れそうって連絡入れとく……？
trans:
Should I let her know we might be a little late to the
meeting...?

name: 甜花
text:
──お、思い出すね……！
ちっちゃい時……！
trans:
──T-Tenka remembers too...!
That one time... when we were little......!

name: 甘奈
text:
雪ってだけで楽しくって、
はしゃいじゃったよね……！
trans:
Snow on its own was enough for us to have fun and
play around...!

name: 甘奈
text:
さっき、
動けないって言ってたのに～
trans: Didn't you say that you couldn't move, earlier～?

name: 甜花
text:
けど……なんか……！
にへへ……
trans: But... Tenka just kinda ran......! Nihehe......

name: 甘奈
text:
ね！
このまま事務所まで、競争しない？
trans: Hey, wanna race to the office?

name: 甘奈
text:
そしたら、
打ち合わせにも間に合うかも！
trans: If we do that, we might make it to the meeting on time!

name: 甜花
text:
で、でも……
それは……絶対負ける……
trans: B-But...... Tenka... would lose for sure......

name: 甘奈
text:
えーっ？
そんなことないよ～！
